excerpt: Campos do Jordão is a municipality in Brazil’s Mantiqueira Mountains and part of the state of São Paulo. It encompasses a city of the same name, where Swiss-style architecture is common, and the Parque Estadual de Campos do Jordão to the northeast. Sprawling over a third of the municipality, the park’s pine forests and mountains are home to a variety of birds and endangered animals, including pumas and ocelots.
detail_description: Campos do Jordão, located in Brazil's Mantiqueira Mountains and part of São Paulo state, is known for its Swiss-style architecture. The city is home to Parque Estadual de Campos do Jordão, a vast park covering a third of the municipality with pine forests and mountains that provide habitats for various bird species and endangered animals like pumas and ocelots. Additionally, visitors can enjoy the milder weather during the off-season when the city is less crowded.
name: Campos do Jordão
address: State of São Paulo, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: This former governor's palace showcases historical objects & art, along with contemporary works.
detail_description: Boa Vista Palace, a former governor's residence in winter, now serves as a museum showcasing historical objects and art alongside contemporary works. The palace offers guided tours on specific days, so it's recommended to book in advance. Built in the European style, the palace boasts a vast area worth exploring. On weekends, it attracts many visitors with highly knowledgeable guides sharing its history and significance within the state government.
name: Boa Vista Palace
address: Av. Adhemar Pereira de Barros, 3001 - Jardim Dirce, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: With its Swiss-style architecture, the lively central area of Capivari is a popular winter retreat. Sidewalk bars line buzzing Rua Djalma Foraz, and surrounding streets have fondue restaurants and high-end European dining. Upscale gift shops sell knitwear, leather products, and artisanal chocolates. It’s a 5-minute ride on the Teleférico cable car to the top of Morro do Elefante hill, which offers sweeping views.
detail_description: Capivari is a charming area known for its Swiss-style architecture and vibrant atmosphere, making it a popular destination for winter getaways. The central area features bustling Rua Djalma Foraz, lined with sidewalk bars and surrounded by fondue restaurants and upscale European dining options. Visitors can explore upscale gift shops offering knitwear, leather goods, and artisanal chocolates.
name: Capivari
address: Campos do Jordão - State of São Paulo, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Art museum featuring the works of a Polish-born sculptor, plus a performance venue & garden space.
detail_description: Museu Felícia Leirner is an open-air museum located in a lush forest area, showcasing over 100 sculptures created by the Polish-born artist. The museum's garden and Araucaria forest are adorned with bronze and white cement sculptures, reflecting the different phases of the artist's career. Adjacent to the museum is the Claudio Santoro Auditorium, which hosts various cultural events including theater, music, and dance performances as well as being home to the International Winter Festival.
name: Museu Felícia Leirner
address: Av. Dr. Luis Arrobas Martins, 1880 - Alto Boa Vista, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Tranquil monastery with regular masses featuring Gregorian chanting, plus a garden, a lake & a shop.
detail_description: Mosteiro de São João - Monjas Beneditinas is a serene monastery located in a beautiful forest and garden. The architecture of the building is stunning, and it's home to the Benedictine nuns. Visitors can attend regular masses with Gregorian chanting, stroll through the peaceful grounds, and explore the on-site shop offering handmade crafts and products. The atmosphere exudes tranquility, with the sound of Gregorian chants filling the chapel.
name: Mosteiro de São João - Monjas Beneditinas
address: Av. Dr. Adhemar de Barros, 330 - Abernéssia, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Hilltop terrace with elephant statues, accessed by road or cable car, for city & mountain views.
detail_description: Morro do Elefante is a must-visit spot offering breathtaking city and mountain views. Accessible by road or cable car, the hilltop terrace provides an incredible panoramic view of the entire tourist center. The cable car ride is a popular choice for reaching the top, where visitors can enjoy the stunning scenery and even return for a second visit. Standing at 1800 meters above sea level, this location offers an adrenaline-pumping experience with its elephant trunk-like curvature.
name: Morro do Elefante
address: Av. da Vila Médica - Jardim Belvedere, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Several man-made waterfalls & showers accessed by wooden decks with nearby stalls selling souvenirs.
detail_description: Ducha de Prata is a popular tourist spot in Campos do Jordao, featuring man-made waterfalls and showers accessible via wooden decks. The water supply comes directly from the natural waterfalls of Ribeirao de Perdizes. Visitors can stroll along the wooden bridges, listen to the soothing sounds of the waterfall, and explore nearby souvenir stalls offering various items such as clothing, chocolates, and crafts.
name: Ducha de Prata
address: Av. Mariane Baungart, 2485 - Vila Izabel, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Compact retail shop with cafe tables offering a wide variety of chocolates, candies & gift items.
detail_description: Chocolates Factory Araucaria is a compact retail shop with cafe tables that offers a wide variety of chocolates, candies, and gift items. Visitors can enjoy tastings of chocolates, cheeses, antipasti, wines, liquors, and cachacas at the Artisan Chocolate Factory. The factory also features a small museum that tells the story of chocolate.
name: Chocolates Factory Araucaria
address: Av. Amadeu Carletti Junior, 255 - Jaguaribe, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12472-008, Brazil

excerpt: Country-style guesthouse in a recreation park, offering cozy rooms, a terrace & free breakfast.
detail_description: Parque Tarundu is a country-style guesthouse located in Campos do Jordao, SP. It offers cozy rooms, a terrace, and free breakfast. The park entrance fee varies depending on the activities you choose to do and ranges from R$19.00 (half), R$38.00 (full) to R$170.00 (VIP).
name: Parque Tarundu
address: Av. José A. Manso, 1515 - Toriba, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Popular lakefront park with pedal boats & a mountain chair lift boasting scenic views.
detail_description: Parque Capivari is a popular lakefront park in Campos do Jordao, offering a variety of attractions and activities for visitors. It features pedal boats and a mountain chair lift that provides stunning scenic views. Additionally, the park has recently added new amenities such as a revamped café, a creperie at the Morro do Elefante viewpoint, and a Ferris wheel in the main square. For families with children and teenagers, there's an adventure and entertainment area available as well.
name: Parque Capivari
address: R. Eng. Diogo José de Carvalho, 1291 - Capivari, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Portal de Campos do Jordão is a must-visit spot in the charming city of Campos do Jordão, located near São Paulo. This alpine-style gateway serves as a welcoming symbol for visitors entering the city and provides essential tourist information. Situated on the SP-123 highway, it's often the first attraction that greets tourists arriving from São Paulo. Upon arrival, friendly agents are on hand to offer maps and insider tips about the region.
name: Portal de Campos do Jordão
address: Rod. Floriano Rodrigues Pinheiro, km 43 - Vista Alegre, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Gruta dos Crioulos is a historical site located on the path to Pedra do Bau. It is named after a legend that says it once sheltered escaped slaves from nearby farms during the time of slavery. The cave is formed by a large, flat, concave stone with a diameter of 30m and a depth of 20m, providing shelter for numerous people. Although it offers beautiful landscapes and historical significance, the site is not well-maintained and may have graffiti.
name: Gruta dos Crioulos
address: Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Serene botanical garden offering a variety of flora & fauna, plus labyrinths, eateries & events.
name: Amantikir Park
address: R. Simplício Ribeiro de Toledo Neto, 2200 - Gavião Gonzaga, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12467-610, Brazil

excerpt: Several small houses inspired by children's stories & fables, with costumed staff on weekends.
detail_description: The Enchanted Forest Park is a magical destination for families, featuring small houses inspired by beloved children's stories and fables. Nestled in a lush green setting, the park spans 12 thousand square meters and showcases whimsical toy houses like the House of Rabbits, House of Angels, House of Snow White, and more. On weekends, visitors can encounter costumed staff adding to the enchanting atmosphere.
name: the Enchanted Forest Park
address: R. Arandi, 270 - Vila Poran, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Lookout point featuring sweeping views of the surrounding mountains & street food vendors.
name: Vista Chinesa - Mirante
address: Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Located at the top of Morro do Elefante, Elephant Park is a charming attraction featuring fiberglass statues of various elephant species, including mammoths. Visitors can explore souvenir stalls and handicrafts while enjoying the panoramic view from the lookout point. The park offers free admission with the option to take a photo at the entrance for a small fee, which will be turned into a keychain as a memento. It's an ideal spot to educate children about elephants in an engaging and interactive way.
name: Elephant Park
address: R. N " Cinco ", 97 - Jd Belvedere, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Museum in a former monastery dedicated to woodcuts & wood engraving, with workshops & a library.
detail_description: Located in a former monastery building from 1928, Museu Casa da Xilogravura is a unique museum in Brazil entirely dedicated to the art of woodcut printing. This traditional printmaking technique involves carving images onto wooden blocks for printing. The museum houses an extensive collection of woodcut prints created by over 400 artists, offering visitors a deep dive into the history and complexity of xilogravura.
name: Museu Casa da Xilogravura
address: Av. Eduardo Moreira da Cruz, 295 - Jaguaribe, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12472-028, Brazil

detail_description: Paróquia São Benedito, located in the charming Praça São Benedito in Vila Capivari, is a delightful church that captures the essence of simplicity and beauty. While it may not be grandiose, its inviting atmosphere makes it worth a visit. The church features lovely stained glass windows and is surrounded by a quaint market with various stands offering unique items, including delicious chocolates.
name: Paróquia São Benedito
address: Av. Macedo Soares, 55 - Capivari, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: St. Benedict Square is a charming and vibrant space perfect for leisurely strolls both day and night. The square is lined with various shops, restaurants, and bars, creating a bustling atmosphere. During the Christmas season, the square transforms into a magical wonderland with enchanting decorations that make visitors feel like they've stepped into another world.
name: St. Benedict Square
address: Av. Macedo Soares, 5 - J Elizabete, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled atop a sun-kissed mountain, Cachoeira Véu da Noiva is a breathtaking destination that promises an unforgettable experience. Just 200 meters from the stunning waterfall, this location is perfect for hiking and horseback riding, with the charming center of Capivari only a short 10-minute walk away. The inviting accommodations feature spacious social areas adorned with beautiful stained glass windows that bathe the rooms in natural light while offering picturesque views.
name: Cachoeira Véu da Noiva
address: Lot. Veu da Noiva, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Quirky bar sculpted from blocks of ice & serving alcoholic & non-alcoholic drinks in ice cups.
detail_description: Iceland - Bar de Gelo is a unique and popular spot in Campos do Jordao, attracting tourists who enjoy exploring different places. This ice bar, established in 2017, offers alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks served in ice cups within an icy setting. Visitors can expect special themed settings, exclusive drinks, and ice sculptures for the whole family to enjoy. It's recommended to dress warmly with a heavy coat, hat, and scarf to fully experience this innovative attraction.
name: Iceland - Bar de Gelo
address: Av. Macedo Soares, 123 - Capivari, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Tropical park featuring hiking & nature trails, plus paintball, shuttlecock & other entertainment.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of nature, the Grove of Silence is a tropical park that promises an exhilarating escape for adventure seekers and nature lovers alike. With its impressive altitude of 2,030 meters at Pico do Itapeva, visitors are treated to breathtaking views over the Serra da Mantiqueira region and beyond, where up to 15 cities can be spotted across the Vale do Paraiba. The Grove of Silence offers a plethora of activities designed to get your adrenaline pumping.
name: Grove Of Silence
address: Av. Sen. Roberto Simonsen, 1724 - Jardim Alpestre, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Parque da Cerejeira de Campos do Jordão is a delightful attraction that transports visitors to the Asian continent, particularly Japan, with its stunning cherry blossoms. The park offers a picturesque setting for capturing beautiful photos and immersing oneself in the delightful Japanese atmosphere. Additionally, the park hosts the Cherry Blossom Festival on weekends during July and August when the cherry blossoms are at their peak.
name: Parque da Cerejeira de Campos do Jordão
address: Av. Tassaburo Yamaguchi, 2.173 - Vila Albertina, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Mirante Lajeado, an exquisite tourist spot in Campos do Jordao, boasts unparalleled customer service and an exceptional hamburger. With stunning vistas that captivate visitors, this location offers awe-inspiring panoramic views of the breathtaking surrounding landscape. A must-see destination, Mirante Lajeado guarantees a top-notch experience worth every penny spent.
name: Mirante Lajeado
address: Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Fazendinha Toriba is an enjoyable destination for families with young children. The staff at this theme park are highly attentive and provide excellent service. Children can engage in interactive activities such as petting and feeding the animals, creating a fun and memorable experience. The park also offers picturesque locations for taking photos, making it a great place to capture special moments. Overall, Fazendinha Toriba is a fantastic spot that guarantees an engaging and accessible adventure for kids.
name: Fazendinha Toriba
address: Estr. Mun. Paulo Costa Lenz Cesar, 630, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Catholic church Matriz de Santa Teresinha do Menino Jesus - Campos do Jordão is a beautiful place to go for mass. The safety protocols that are followed during mass keep the congregation safe, and the side doors are kept open to maintain ventilation.
name: Paróquia Santa Teresinha do Menino Jesus - Campos do Jordão
address: R. Tadeu Rangel Pestana, 662 - Abernéssia, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Scenic viewpoint at over 6,100 feet with a wooden deck & forested Mantiqueira Mountain views.
detail_description: Pico do Imbiri is a secluded spot offering stunning views of the Mantiqueira Mountains from its wooden deck at over 6,100 feet. It's part of a cluster of attractions in Campos do Jordao, including Pico do Itapeva and Vila Capivari. The area is known for its European-style architecture and popular restaurants, bars, cafes, chocolate shops, and craft stores.
name: Pico do Imbiri
address: Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Prana Sunset is a stunning destination in Campos do Jordão, renowned for its breathtaking views, especially after Pico do Itapeva. Visitors rave about the excellent service and delightful food served on a charming deck adorned with umbrellas, perfect for enjoying the picturesque sunset. The ambiance is enhanced by great music that sets the mood for relaxation and celebration. While there’s a parking fee to access this beautiful spot, many agree that the experience makes it worthwhile.
name: Prana Sunset
address: Rua Gustavo Biagioni, Estr. p/ O Pico do Itapeva, 7900, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Praça Izabel Cury Paulo
address: R. Brg. Jordão, 1317 - V Telma, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Municipal Market of Campos do Jordao, located just 1.6 km away, is a must-visit shopping spot for travelers. Additionally, within close proximity at 1 km is Caminho da Roca, offering more shopping opportunities. Nature enthusiasts can explore the nearby tropical Grove Of Silence Park, situated 4.1 km from the market.
name: Municipal market of Campos do Jordao
address: Av. Dr. Adhemar de Barros, 26 - Abernéssia, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Located approximately 2.7 km from Center Kart in Sao Lourenco, Hotel Brasil offers amenities such as a Turkish steam bath and an outdoor pool with garden views. This family-friendly hotel also provides Wi-Fi on the property. Guests can enjoy various activities including karting, climbing, and bowling nearby. While food options are limited, the hotel is praised for its enjoyable atmosphere and top-notch facilities according to reviews.
name: Center Kart
address: Rodovia São Lourenço Km 380, Palmela, São Lourenço - MG, 37470-000, Brazil

detail_description: Parque da Lagoinha is a simple yet pleasant park, offering a great opportunity to connect with nature and the city's woodlands. The park features expansive green areas, well-marked trails, a lake with ducks, and even some animals like sheep. Additionally, it houses Maostiqueiras shop which trains community members to create artisanal products from 100% natural wool. Visitors can enjoy feeding the animals and exploring the beautiful nature while having picnics or barbecues.
name: Parque da Lagoinha
address: Av. Pedro Paulo, 1455 - Lot. Veu da Noiva, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: The sled ride at Trenó de Montanha - Campos do Jordão is an enjoyable experience. However, the pricing of 50 per person or 75 for a double and the process of waiting in a virtual queue to be called to wait in another line seems illogical. Additionally, there is only one scale available to determine if you can ride in a double during boarding.
name: Trenó de Montanha - Campos do Jordão
address: 7CPM+H98, Jardim Belvedere, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Landmark station offering a small history museum & short train rides through the bush & mountains.
detail_description: Emílio Ribas Station is a landmark station that not only offers a small history museum but also provides short train rides through the bush and mountains. It serves as the home of Estrada de Ferro Campos do Jordao and is the starting point for two famous city tours: the cable car tour and Maria Fumaca. Opened in 1924, this station is a true journey back in time, evoking a sense of being in a period drama.
name: Emílio Ribas Station
address: Av. Emílio Ribas, s/n - Capivari, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Mirante Por do Sol
address: R. Via Marte, 104, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

detail_description: Romantik Dalen, also known as the umbrella walkway, is a charming wooden bridge adorned with colorful hanging umbrellas. Couples often visit this spot to hang love locks and capture romantic photos. It's a popular location for tourists seeking picturesque backdrops and unique souvenirs from nearby stores. The area offers free access and convenient parking, making it an ideal destination for couples looking to create lasting memories in a whimsical setting.
name: Romantik Dalen
address: R. Dr. Raphael Pelegrino Gianotti, 196 - Capivari, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Nextor Park
address: Av. Emílio Lang Júnior, 500 - Capivari, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-287, Brazil

name: CARDE | Arte Design Museu
address: Rua Benedito Olímpio Miranda, Av. Alto da Boa Vista, 280, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Square of Arts
address: Rod. Federal, 353 - V Matilde, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Mirante Mantiqueira
address: 699Q+JR, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

excerpt: Outdoor recreation park offering zip lining, canopy walks & bike rentals in a forest locale.
name: Mananciais de Campos do Jordão State Park
address: Av. Pedro Paulo, s/n, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Mirante de Vidro AME Campos
address: Av. Ernesto Diederichsen - V Matilde, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Enophile Vinhos
address: Av. Dr. Januário Miraglia, 2594 - Loja 6 - Jaguaribe, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil

name: Castelo Japonês Toyamajo
address: R. Sete, 176 - Descansópolis, Campos do Jordão - SP, 12460-000, Brazil
